Above all, it must keep families together, safeguard due process, and balance humane treatment with strong border management to sustain healthy, inclusive communities and a resilient economy.

statement: Immigration policy should balance compassion with the rule of law, recognizing the dignity and contributions of immigrants to our communities and economy. Above all, families belong together, vulnerable people are protected, and newcomers are welcomed as neighbors who enrich our shared future.
